website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and affordable, but not terribly effective for anything more than a very small room.
pros: Features a pre-filter, carbon filter, and a HEPA filter
Main filter lasts 3-to-5 years, while the pre-filter should be changed every 3 months or so
cons: Only purifies up to 50 square feet
Running light is very bright for nighttime, and impossible to shut off if the unit is running

customer_reviews.title: Danger! Danger!
customer_reviews.text: I have several pets and thought this purifier might help, but last night, in the wee hours, it burst into flames! My smoke alarm began blaring and I jumped up to find 6-foot high flames shooting up into the air from the air purifier location. I managed to grab my phone and a pair of pants, and run out into the yard to call 911. My house is not even habitable now. How ironic that this device says it gets rid of smoke odors. My whole house smells of smoke now, with soot everywhere. I should have just lived with the pet odors. :-(
customer_reviews.author: D. Cusick

customer_reviews.title: Approved!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has bad allergies so he’s always sneezing and I wanted something small for the bedroom- it’s cute and light. The light when it’s on is a little bright but it’s not so bad. When it’s on you can definitely hear it but it mostly sounds like a fan inside of a computer. So it’s there but not annoying. He hasn’t sneezed much post gettting this. We’re v happy. (In the video it’s going to sound louder standing in front of it vs when you’re laying in bed across the room)
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Already See a Difference
customer_reviews.text: I'm so surprised at the difference I can feel in just the three days I've been using this air purifier. I live in a very dusty area, and have pretty bad seasonal allergies. I usually wake up in the morning with a sore throat, itchy eyes, runny nose, etc. But I haven't! It's amazing. I've also noticed a distict decrease in the amount of dust in my room. I usually have to dust at least every few days (usually only do it once a week though) and my room seems less dusty in general. I'm very impressed with this machine. If you found this review helpful, please click "helpful" at the bottom! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Murray

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: returned immediately for the cancerous emission warning. Should have read others' review before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Huong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: There are much better air cleaners for this price. Find the review that has a video demonstrating the noise level. You can hear how cheap the motor is when the device switches on and listen to it get louder when it goes from low to high. Even on low, it's too noisy for a$40 air cleaner. And it has no draw power. If a tiny piece of dust drifts within 2 or 3 inches, the cleaner will grab it, but it won't catch much of anything that's visible to the naked eye or that falls more than 5 inches away. This one is small and will do nothing for you.
customer_reviews.author: L. Skipper

customer_reviews.title: No replacement filters are available.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine until you realize that you need to replace the filter every ~2 months or so an none are available.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!
customer_reviews.text: This purifier was listed among the QUIETEST available, and at a bargain price. Well, it's not much of a bargain because of the WHIRRRRRRRR that is audible through walls. What a disappointment - it's the perfect size, it's two-speed and the cord on the adapter is even long enough to be useful. But the motor's WHIRRRRRRR will drive you nuts. And don't even think about using this in the bedroom... the blue light will keep you awake if the noise doesn't. If it was worth the trouble to return, I would.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Collects smells and then the fan spreads them with emphasis after one hour. Now the smell coming from the unit are a musty stronger version of the original. I am dissatisfied completely with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Satterwhite

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in the room where we keep our cats littler box. No matter how much you try or what kind of litter you use the kitty box is still going to smell. I wanted something small that would easily fit in a small room and not use a lot of energy. This seems to do the trick. It is very easy to use, very quiet and does help with the kitty smell. Overall a very good purchase for the money. I am glad I did not cave and buy a more expensive one. This one does just great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have two large hairy dogs and lots of dust
customer_reviews.text: We have two large hairy dogs and lots of dust (I try, but with 5 kids, I don't always dust as often as I should). Because of this, my mother in law starts to get allergy attacks when she comes in the house. After lots of dusting, vacuuming and wiping down, I decided to place this purifier in the guest room where they stayed. You could immediately tell a difference and she left after her visit stating she felt it really made a difference!! It's small and fits nicely on the dresser. We haven't had to change the filter yet.
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnston7

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job for a small room, durable so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Easy to clean, easier to install. The lil blue light stays on all the time while it is running. I have been running it 24/7 since I bought it in our bathroom, and it has help up perfectly. It is a SMALL fan inside, so don't expect this to cover or calm any smoke or heavy odor. Get more serious than this product if you need super, truly clean air. That being said, the small fan uses next to no electricity and runs like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: I really do like this air purifier
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this air purifier. I have two dogs and two cats, and this keeps the air fresh! My only complaint is that I have to replace the WHOLE filter every time the light comes on.. Which is $18 every 3 months it seems. But with all the pet dander this could be why it needs replacing more often in my house. To me that's a waste of materials and wish it had the ability to wash the filter multiple times before replacing the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorswoman

customer_reviews.title: Great for your RV or Desktop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small unit which is perfect for a bathroom, RV, desktop etc. The unit had two fan speeds and the motor is quiet enough. The air intake is four sided allowing for maximum air flow. The power plug for the unit is like average length. Good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie01

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in my bedroom. I recently found out I am allergic to dogs and I have two pugs who sleep in bed with me (and shed a ton!) It isn't very loud at all (other reviews point this out as a con, but I didn't even notice it!). I usually only run it at night (when I am in my room), and have noticed an improvement in my sleeping. Also my room no longer smells doggy. I feel like the light on the top of the machine is perhaps a little bright for my liking, bit otherwise I'm very happy with this! I'd definitely recommend this air purifier!
customer_reviews.author: Kar Star

customer_reviews.title: NOISY but works with Alexa on Smart Outlets which is nice
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This thing is so "dumb" that you can use it with a Smart/WiFi outlet and control it remotely. Just turn the Filter on, and then control power state with a smart outlet. I'm using mine with Alexa which is nice. I have it scheduled to run while I'm away. Cons: Loud, noisy Literally I can hear this thing running in ANOTHER ROOM BEHIND A CLOSED DOOR. That's how loud this thing is. Impossible to watch a TV show or sleep with this thing running. I can only use it while I'm not in my house. Yeah... it's a cheap model but I expected something at least a little better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Pet odors, allergens and other smells had my small apartments air feeling gross and musty. I looked at many products and read a ton of reviews on air purifiers, but didn't want something that was too big, noisy or expensive. I've had it around 6 months at this point and changed the filter once (which you can find for under $20). It still works great, isn't too noisy and make me feel like I can breathe better at home!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: A TRUE STORY
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of this brand before but purchased a Homelabs portable washing machine. Impressed! So then I purchased a Homelabs small freezer. The air purifiers sold on Amazon were so varied I spent hours, days and weeks researching. Bought this air purifier based on the Homelabs name alone. Exceeded all my expectations! Best yet this machine purifies 40 square ft. AMAZING! 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Towers2000

customer_reviews.title: Size and looks are fine but it's LOUD
customer_reviews.text: LOUD. I got this to sit on a nightstand in my bedroom for it's small size and (alleged) quiet running sound based on description. It's as loud as machines three times it's size on their higher settings. It's not just a wind type sound - it's a mechanical type sound which usually comes with cheaper plastic blade fans. I don't think it's defective - just cheaply made. May just take it to work so they can use it in a louder environment, but in my opinion it certainly could not be used in rooms that require quiet (bedrooms, nurseries, TV rooms, etc). The size and shape are nice so it's a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: Filter-tastic!
customer_reviews.text: I was highly skeptic when I opened up the package and even after I hooked it up and turned it on. It keeps my husbands smoke from coming into the house. Amazing how well it works for such a small machine! I would say you would need more than one for a large area, but ours works for a one room size/small garage. Hopefully this helps you make a decision!
customer_reviews.author: lisaspaintbrush

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I used to sneeze a lot in my room, and this was a cheap alternative to other on the market. At first I was doubtful thinking it wasn’t going to work, but now that I have it I can confidently say it works great, my sneezes have stoped and the air in here feels much lighter. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Maybe Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great size and very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I love how small this is. I have it in my office at work and was worried about the noise, but it is actually very quiet and you can hardly tell it's running. Since I started it I have noticed less smell and mold growth in my normally moldy office. Between this and a small dehumidifier I think I have made my office much better. This is great for the price if you have a small space needing some air purification.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work if you dont have it in a private space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work because all of my co-workers smoke and it lingers. However, I share an office room with one. I do not have a cubicle. The fact the air blows straight up isn't helpful. A filter that blows directly in my face would be more helpful to keep my breathing air clear. Really bummed I didn't think this through before I bought it. I'm sure it works in a small, closed space like an isolated office or cubicle. But not a large open airy office. When I stick my head over the top the air coming out smells fresh and neutral but that's not useful while trying to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey T.G

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: The air in my office always triggers my allergy attacks and since I take 4 different prescriptions and was still having issues with allergies, I decided to buy a purifier. This one got such great reviews that I gave it a chance. So far, no allergy issues in my office (I do have issues if I walk into someone else's office sometimes), so it seems to be working. It's small enough to sit on my desk and not get in the way. I took away a star simply because it's a bit noisy (like a fan running) and I expected it to be quieter like my humidifier running in the same office.
customer_reviews.author: JLovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't remove any dust
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to work. I've had it on for over a month now and the amount of dust in my bedroom is the same as it was before I implemented this air purifier. Now it says the filter needs to be replaced, but I took out the filter and it looks exactly the same as it did when it was brand new. Other HomeLabs products seem to be good, but this one is not effective and frankly a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for allergies
customer_reviews.text: This purifier is wonderful and affordable. I purchased 2 for each of my kids. They each have pretty horrendous allergies and at night my toddler would cough so much from drainage that it would wake him. We were all barely sleeping anymore. The first night I used the purifiers the kiddos were peacefully asleep the entire night (at one point I checked my 2 year olds breathing because he was so quiet) and refreshed without stuffy noses or coughs come morning!!!! We all got great sleep for the first time in months!! I will be purchasing more here in the near future for my room and for my mom because she has bad allergies too. Great product and design too.
customer_reviews.author: Randi M

customer_reviews.title: Fire risk, Worthless, has no suction.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor air flow!! Wont pull a tissue to it. Also the fan is VERY cheap and sounds like its dying after only a month or so of use. Sometimes it spins up and then down for no good reason at all. It's cheap plastic and even cheaper parts. I would consider this a fire safety issue if not watched. Don't use unattended!!
customer_reviews.author: Luke @HuzzahGamers

customer_reviews.title: this is a GREAT machine BUT buyer beware - filters are now REALLY expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. It's quiet & works very well for my tiny apartment. Filters need to be replaced every 30 days (depending on dirt) and used to be 12 but are now TWENTY dollars each. This means I'll no longer be able to afford to replace the filters every month. SO disappointed as I really do love this little machine.
customer_reviews.author: YGinNYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Air Filter!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my office and my home. It is small and not meant for large spaces, but it suits my environment. It is quiet and I notice an improvement in the air quality in my home. Studies are suggesting using these type of filters for Covid 19. For that reason alone, this is a worthy investment.
customer_reviews.author: Blender User

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly - Eliminates Odors from 2 Sugar Gliders
customer_reviews.text: This little air filter is AMAZING. I have 2 sugar gliders that produce odors daily despite cleaning their cage on a regular basis. We have a relatively small home and the room it's in is also small. If those little gliders make any kind of scent, you can smell it throughout the house. After only an hour, I could definitely tell a difference and after a day, the smell was completely gone. This thing works great! It's also quiet and fits into compact spaces. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I don’t feel any difference with this on or off. I don’t think think it’s even doing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver! I love with my dog and the amount of dust we accumulate is insane! I had to dust every other day and now with this purifier I dust every three weeks!!! I do have to replace the filters almost every month but the amount of dust it grabs for me is so worth it. And you can’t beat the price! It does have little fan sound but it relaxes me enough to put me to sleep. The design is so sleek my friend thought it was a speaker. Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mayla Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wont be without one now. I unboxed a few hundred books that had been in storage for as long as 25 years. They all had a musty smell of varying degree. The 'library' had a heck of musty smell going, so much so I'd get a headache after a half hour in the room. Installed this little beauty at low speed and a week later the smell is gone and the room is easy to spend time in.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Thieman

customer_reviews.title: Works great on smells!! Cooking, household cleaners, litter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep near my car boxes. I have 2 cats and keep 3 boxes for them. I scoop them daily but they are still smelly. At first I didn’t notice much difference.... but what sold me on this product was..... One day I was cleaning my bathroom and I used probably three different products between the toilet, shower/bath and floor. The chemicals were very strong. I went and grab this from the other room and within 5-10 minutes the smell was gone!!! I was very impressed. I’ve also moved it to the kitchen counter while cooking Something strong. Its worked great. The last 2 weeks it’s stayed right by the litter boxes and I don’t smell anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkkkiiiiiii

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical because I ordered a different brand and it didn’t work so I took my chances with all the reviews that convince me to purchase. It has been a godsend to my household.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Read any and all instructions pertaining to product before usuing
customer_reviews.text: This Air Purifier is a great little asset to have for a one room area, I put this in my bedroom because I have asthma and by putting this there it has decreased my coughing at night, the smell of fabric sprays and other scents, it works perfect for a small area room able to close door you will notice the difference from walking from one room into the room with the Air Purifier amazingly diffent.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well for smoke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the hopes that it would take care of the odor of cigarettes smoke from my downstairs neighbor. The smoke comes through a vent in my very small bathroom, and while this might have helped slightly, it really didn't lessen the smell of smoke as much as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: kayla neeley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small room/office!
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact this is! We use ours in our home office, its quiet, compact, and has two operating levels. the power button changes from red to blue when it's on, We've only had it a few days and already my husband has noticed a difference in his allergies! Highly recommend for compact/small spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies, sinus problems and a compromised immune system. During this pandemic, I decided to buy some of these for my house They work great except for the noise level and the blue light. I finally covered the center blue light, which helped, some.
customer_reviews.author: JWRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So I got this for its smaller size however, when it came in, its a little bigger than I thought. its about the size of a gallon jug. Yes its still smaller than most. It is NOT quiet though on the higher setting. its noisy but does have a good hum to it for white noise. I didnt find that my air quality seemed better though. Honestly, for the price of it, I am not impressed. However, if it ever goes to a half off, I may buy another just for peace of mind that something is better than nothing. Especially with pets, and other allergens.
customer_reviews.author: czmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little machine
customer_reviews.text: I know every product is bound to have negative reviews from those few random people who received a faulty one or something like that.. but quite honestly, I love this little thing. We keep it in our living room and it has severely helped with my dust, pollen and mold allergies!! We've had our for about a year now and have had absolutely no issues with it. I think it's definitely worth the price I paid. And now that we live in a larger house, we'll probably buy a second one for the other half of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEST BEST purchase for our family's budget and needs
customer_reviews.text: Kids, dog, cat and Florida's humid weather destroy our air quality daily. I am a very tidy person but some odors needed extra care. We purchased two for our tiny house. My girls respiratory problems cleared up within the first week. The cat and dog odors are gone! Whenever we cook, the amora no longer lingers! BEST BEST BEST purchase for our family's budget and needs.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: It's really easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: It's does do an okay job. It would be perfect for small office or a closet without a room. I am in a standard size bedroom. It doesn't work well with the fan going on above me, but it takes a few days for it to get to working correctly. This is a small HEPA filter and cube with a small built fan and round 6 1/2 to 7 in cubed. It should be perfect for dorm room, but like a Little engine that could. I'm planning on buying just a larger size to accommodate this room.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Potters

customer_reviews.title: No reason why it shouldn't be more quiet
customer_reviews.text: With all of the whisper-quiet fans available today, there is no reason why I should be hearing any fan noise, especially on low. It almost sounds as though the fan is slightly grinding or dragging. Maybe I have a faulty unit. Unfortunately first impressions matter. I am using this at my office cube in a very quiet office. This noise is not going to work for me. I have a much larger home unit from another maker that I cannot hear at all unless it is on high. I know it is possible to make them quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hardoin

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Today was the first morning in months that I didn’t wake up with congestion and a stuffy nose. I’m basically allergic to everything. (pet dander and pollen mostly) This is perfect for my bedroom. It’s small and compact. Not big a bulky like a lot of others on the market. It has 2 settings. (Low and high). There was no assembly required. Just plug in the cord. It conveniently twists apart at the bottom to change filter.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Once a month filter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item on the 24th of April meaning I have had it for about a month now, I have not noticed a difference in air because I still need my allergy medication going to bed, however now a month later it’s time to change the filter (red light) so either it’s doing something or you just need a monthly filter either way it’s gonna be an expensive journey I expected the filter to last Longer hence the low rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Just set them up today, one in my living room and another in the bedroom so as far as longterm review I don’t have one yet, but I am very disappointed how LOUD these are, multiple reviews with how soft the sound is and that’s not true, They sound like the old fans We use to put in the window back in the day when it was hot out, (maybe someone people like that noise) I destroyed the boxes like an idiot if I didn’t they would be going back
customer_reviews.author: PA.NY

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and cute and small. Only been using it for a week for my carpet floor dust. Everyone was saying that it was noisier than they thought, and I can see what they are talking about. I always have my desktop PC on, and my PC fan's noise is about the same as this product's (doesn't mean that my PC fan noise is noisy though :P ), so I wasn't really bothered with the noise. The blue light is a bit bright if the room is dark too, but I wasn't really bothered with anything at all. Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: Weak performance, loud and bright. This is my 4th air purifier and it isn't worth the hype. I bought it for my very small room in Iraq ( I am a contractor ) and it just barely worked and I needed a new filter before the filter was even really dirty. Loud for so little performance and lit up my room a ton so I had a hard time sleeping for a while till I was used to it. 3 stars is generous in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Helped during west coast wildfires.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing filter. During the west coast wildfires... This thing came in handy. Definitely get one. I bought 3 of them for my place. Keep one on the bedroom and by your desk area for comfortable sleep. Anywhere u spend a lot of time in your house, place a filter there. Recommended. Only knock against it is th price.
customer_reviews.author: HDTVforMe

customer_reviews.title: It Seems to Work
customer_reviews.text: This is quiet and runs well. It looks like the kind of thing that will die pretty quickly, but I've had it for a while now and it is still running fine. I am a little skeptical about how much it actually is purifying the air, but I keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina E

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well but extremely noisy when filter is dirty
customer_reviews.text: This does clean the dust and cat fur from the air. My biggest problem is that all of a sudden around every 30 mins I would get a ear piercing beep. I checked everything in my house nothing till I checked out the filter on this. Was very gunked up. Took vacuum hose to it. And now no longer hearing this beep. (Was about as loud as a smoke detector). I was planning on getting another one till this happened. But might look into a different kind
customer_reviews.author: Bridget T

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, I guess. 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: While it is easy to assemble and install, I don’t know how well it works. I was hoping my allergies would get better from using this purifier, but they aren’t. After month of using this, very little dirt is on the filter, so I don’t know if it is working. Also, the purifier has a very bright blue light that shines when you have it on, which is kind of distracting at night time when you’re trying to sleep. It’s not too loud though.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney J

customer_reviews.title: It has reduced my allergies significantly
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from asthma and allergies which my two cats trigger. Having a ceiling fan in my bedroom, imagine how the dust, cats hair and skin are flowing around the air while I'm in my room. This purifier has significantly improved the air quality in here, and truly made a difference in the control of allergies to (mostly) my babies <3<3<3 Have another one in my boyfried's place because... I'm also allergic to his doggos :/ Very pleased with this purchase and have even recommended to friends who are suffering with the Sahara Dust here in the Caribbean where we live.
customer_reviews.author: Arlette

customer_reviews.title: Great Design for small areas
customer_reviews.text: I am new to air purifiers but I wanted something to help keep my home fresh and the air clean for our kids, especially during our spring inversions. I like the clean lines of this purifier, it blends into our living area easily. It is simple to use and after a week of constant use is still working great. It has a low sound but I find it not an issue. This is for a smaller area, not a whole home but for its intended use- this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieM

customer_reviews.title: This workED well for small spaces - but is now broken
customer_reviews.text: and it is fairly quiet, but I only used it maybe a total of 40 hours over the last 90 days -- and went in a few days ago to refresh the air after the holidays and the lights go on but nothing is home -- nada. won't start...past the return/exchange date...so gotta go thru the whole call the manufactureere thingee thing... bleh bleh bleh. Changed from 5* to 2* as it did do nicely for those 40 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Annastasia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had this machine for over a year, I use it every night.
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad allergies and I turn this on at night not only to help me, but like a fan would do. It gives off a light white noise sound and it’s soothing. I have it next to my bed when my husband and I sleep. For someone that wants it very quiet or almost dead quiet. It gets louder if you turn up the mode to a higher setting so I would not recommend this for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Quality and Expectations

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Bedside Table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. I can always tell how well it works on the nights I forget to run it and wake up congested and irritated- on the nights I run this, I wake up feeling refreshed. Obviously only suitable for a smaller space, but really great for an office desk or a bedroom. The only thing that isn’t great about it is the blue light- it is quite bright, so for light sensitive folks this could be a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Nice little air purifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office. Its size and power make it suitable for a smaller room, but it will probably not be effective in cleaning the air in a larger space. I use it in a non-smoking environment, so it's mostly filtering out dust and other particles, which is why I'm probably getting a longer life out of my filter. It did have a plastic smell out of the box, but that went away after a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good, but the filter light came on after ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, but the filter light came on after only a month of purifying on the low setting. If I buy a new filter every month, I'll be paying $144 a year, in which case I might as well just buy one of pricier germ guardian purifiers which are larger and more efficient and only pay $27 every 6-8 months to replace the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Esther K.

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: doesnt really feel a difference needed this for at home nail services not powerful enough for the price
customer_reviews.author: Maya Riley

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY FOR PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to help with the smell of small pet cages and saw an immediate difference within a few hours! Within two days there was no smell at all! I clean cages every two weeks religiously but I hate that there is still an animal/ bedding smell. Problem solved and I am comforted knowing the air quality is better and there is less dust and dander as well. Note to add: the device is located right by the cages in my living room and honestly it freshens the whole room!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Morgan

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WEIGHT,  EASY TO MOVE FROM ROOM TO ROOM AS NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: Photo, cell phone for size comparison. The air smells better after 20 to 30 minutes use. Light weight, easy to move from room to room as needed. Small, fits on the corner of any table or bureau. I use it after vacuuming or cleaning litter boxes to reduce odors that are thrown into the air. Quiet. * Remember to keep the cord out of reach of any pets so they don't chew on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit! It helps with the allergens in the house along with the fur! Its mostly quiet, you can hear a little noise, but fades into the background easily. Its very easy to clean and doesn't take up much space. I've been using it for a few months now, and its still going strong. Its also nice that it doesn't give off any odd smells.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: It works great in my truck.
customer_reviews.text: I am a truck driver. I wanted to buy this for all off the smells I encounter driving across country with a co-driver. The truck space is about 10 foot by 10 foot. I assume this is working properly. How do I know for sure? And for the people that hate the blue nightlight... I just put duct tape over it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Wake with cleaner feeling eyes and nose.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little air purifier. Small but effective. I would recommend to anyone who is looking for a small air purifier for a bedroom or other small room. I really like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat dander
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my one bedroom apartment (about 500 sq ft), mainly for the living room area. I turned it on 24 hours before my boyfriend came over, who suffers from severe cat allergies, and he was improved by 80%. It's quiet and while I know it's good for 50 sq ft, the price was right for what I was looking for. Glad it doesn't take up too much space!
customer_reviews.author: Traveller2

customer_reviews.title: I can easily breath and no more sneezing
customer_reviews.text: I was constantly sneezing and blowing my nose in my office and couldn't figure out the issue. I was also taking my allergy meds regularly. A coworker suggested getting an air purifier and this thing has changed my life. I can easily breath and no more sneezing!!
customer_reviews.author: quratolain a.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a small area!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air purifier for a small area! I have it running in my spare bedroom closet to take out the musty smell that comes up from my basement. I have definitely noticed a difference in the air quality and my things stored in the closet no longer smell musty. I’ve had it going continuously for a month and it has yet to require a filter change. I’m very happy with this air purifier!
customer_reviews.author: SisuGal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, portable air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: This air-purifier is lightweight and quiet. Two speeds. Simple to operate. Easy to move from one room to another. Easy to tell (by the light on top) if it's on and working or now. I keep it in my office by day and by my bed at night, but will buy a second soon. Maybe a third.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marcroft

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I’ve noticed my apartment smells less like animal which is great! I have 2 cats and a 40 pound Pitbull in a 550 square foot apartment. Along with candles, wall plugs and incense, this bad boy keeps my apartment from smelling like a zoo. I’ve also noticed that right now it’s allergy season and I haven’t had an allergy attack so I think it might be contributing to that.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Wood

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 kids who suffer from seasonal allergies. My 1 year old daughter had sleepless nights due to stuffy nose and congestion. And since I have use this purifier it has helped her breath easily and she sleeps threw the night. I'm hoping it will help us have less doctor visits to the doctor for allergies. Since I have used it I can notice a difference in the air it's more cleaner and fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light in RED
customer_reviews.text: The machine size is great, filter replaces easy. BUT, there is this bright Red light on top when power is on/plugged in. There is a Bright Blue light on top when machine is running and on. VERY bright and I hated the way it lit up the whole room. Was not quiet to me either. I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: My company sorts coins from vending machines. That stuff is nasty and dirty. I put this air purifier on my work station to cut down on the yuck that's in the air while working in the small room. I like that it's quiet and has multiple speeds, has a small footprint, and my Kleenex is clean at the end of the day!
customer_reviews.author: kathyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It is way quieter than I expected
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It is way quieter than I expected, especially after researching product reviews (videos) from other buyers. the air feels fresh in my room after leaving it on for even just a couple minutes. I wanted something to help with the dust and any bacteria/germs that may be floating around in the air in my small room. I often get sick and worry about possible mold in my old house and this has helped me tremendously. I wake up without a stuffy nose or a dry/scratchy throat.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful
customer_reviews.text: I put 2 of these in a small closet with both clothes and shoes to try and keep it fresh smelling, but I could not tell they make any difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: TN Lady

customer_reviews.title: Big engine!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy. Amazon pulled off a miracle with delivery. The air filter is working like a big engine! The high control is a little loud but it sounds like a small fan. The low dial is very quiet. There is no odor from the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I can tell a HUGE difference in my sons sleeping since putting this in his room! Will purchase more for other bedrooms
customer_reviews.author: Miki S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buying a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little thing and will definitely be grabbing another one at some point. I find the sound to be like white noise and relaxing. The blue light on it does not bother me. I’m no longer waking up with a stuffy nose or sore throat and the amount of dust that collects around the table that I have it on has significantly decreased. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Renae Juska

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: This had good reviews so we thought we would try it in our den. It is loud, maybe I got a bad one, but it is annoying on the lowest level and worst on the highest. We thought we noticed a difference in air quality, but the sound isn't worth it. Stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: inflixi

customer_reviews.title: Clean air from a small unit
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact..easy on the eyes with one button operation. Led button lets you known what setting is utilized even when off. Perfect for bedroom/bathroom use. The filter is replaceable...I wish that it was washable so money isnt wasted on buying filters..but the air is certainly cleaner-- you can smell it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: I love this Air Purifier - works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this Air Purifier - works great. My family has seasonal allergies and I have put this in our family room. I can feel the difference of the air quality and it keeps the room smelling fresh and clean. I would love to order one for each of our bedrooms too and kitchen. REALLY made a big difference with the dust etc
customer_reviews.author: mom of 2 bg

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. Very little noise but because I'm working I really don't hear it or pay attention to it. It was bigger than what I thought for my desk but I made it work. There is no scent and I haven't had to clean it yet since it's still relatively new.
customer_reviews.author: MzGee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it works or not but it does give me comfort that I'm trying to clean the air in my home. I live in SLC so I'm always looking for ways to clean up the air in my home so we don't get sick or just be breathing smog.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Blazor

customer_reviews.title: Works as far as i know. Will update as i use it more.
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned one before so not sure what to expect. Its extremely quiet. It looks nice and clean and does not stick out like a sore thumb. The filter seems thick and strong. Will keep you updated as i use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblepatch

customer_reviews.title: Cleans air in a small area. Don't expect it to work in a large room.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as an air cleaner when using my 3D printer. I actually installed it in my 3D printer enclosure. It works fairly well considering it was not really made for my application. A byproduct of having it my enclosure is that it moves enough air to lower the temperature in the enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Small size and quiet, but you must change the filters monthly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, compact, air purifier. It is for a small space. The filters are good for only one month, so it is more expensive than some of the larger models. I use it in a small area with pets, and it does a good job eliminating odors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This filter works great for my room and I no longer have problems ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to cats and there are 2 cats in my house so I always keep my room closed off, but sometimes they get in and their dander is locked in here with me and I can't breathe at times. This filter works great for my room and I no longer have problems breathing at night.
customer_reviews.author: Gina T.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: When I first moved into my office, I was crying and couldn’t breathe by lunch time every day. I had sinus headaches everyday. I work in an old building, and the dust, mold and mildew levels are insanely high. I bought this, and within the first hour I noticed an incredible change in the air quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I have one small complaint which I will ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I have one small complaint which I will share in case it affects you too. I bought this for my bedside. At night the blue light on top is quite annoying. If you do not mind light next too your bed it would actually make a nice night light.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use, does a decent job w smell, we use it for our downstairs bathroom which is very small (think just sink and toilet and tall ceiling) and it keep the air feeling clean and smell free IMO
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Not an Ionizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is weak. It is not an ionizer. You get no clean scent which leaves me to think i hardly cleans the air. Not worth the price and is for a small tiny room.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I live in a basement apartment so I was trying to get rid of that musty basement smell. My 8 year old's allergies improved within 2 days of using it and a friend I had over expressed how fresh and clean our place smelled.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: In Love With This.
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly enjoying this item. I live in a townhouse and my neighbors smoke. My house always reeks of smoke, which is bothersome to my kids and myself. I placed this in my living room and it has cleared out the smell of my neighbors stench. It is nice to come home and not walk in to the funk that seeps thru the vents from next door.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect in the unfinished part of my basement where I keep the cats litter pan. I haven’t had a litter box odor since I started using it. The filters are a little pricey but I don’t find that I have to replace them very often, maybe every two months. I’d say this is a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Buy it while available!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Item is exactly as pictured. Small table top HEPA air cleaner. Light blue for on/off switch. No issue in a dark room. Not loud on office desk. Great price. Highly recommend. I would order again. Con: delivered in actual item thin iHome box. NOT any Amazon protective packaging. Labels for shipping on actual item box. No damage, but was surprised to see no protective packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Quietly is an oxymoron.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy for your bedroom, good luck sleeping. The fan noise is not white noise and if you want a good nights sleep, not going to happen. Made in CHINA. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: John NYCTCA

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a while (maybe for a month), and the red light turned on (the indicator for filter change). I changed the filter, but red lihgt is still on. Also, I cut the old filter, just to see if it was really full and dirty, but the filter was almost like new. I'm afraid this air-purifier iz not doing the job... disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Danijela

customer_reviews.title: Ionic is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I haven't sneezed since I bought it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake21

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice to breathe clean air!
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought one of these and I LOVE this. It makes me wonder if I should add larger ones to the house?! This sits at my head on a nite stand. It’s not much larger than a tissue box. It truly does filter smoke odors very well. I am very pleased with it and even came back and got a replacement filter for the future. A worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzancook

customer_reviews.title: Love itttt
customer_reviews.text: I sit this right in the middle of my basement and you can tell the difference.. Definitely worth it.i had if for 4 months and I leave it on all day and still I don't need to change the filter yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

product_meta.title: hOmeLabs 4-in-1 Compact Air Purifier - Quietly Ionizes and Purifies Air to Reduce Odors and Particles from the Air
feature_bullets: HEALTHIER HEPA AIR PURIFIER - Our hOmeLabs personal air purifier has a filter with 99.97% efficiency rating that quietly purifies and ionizes indoor air to reduce odors and particles.

4-STAGE PURIFYING TECHNOLOGY - Our rigorous, 4-stage filtering process includes a pre-filter to capture large particles, a HEPA filter with an ion booster to catch additional air adulterants and help you breathe more easily

ELIMINATES ODORS AND BOOSTS FRESHNESS - Bye-bye bad smells! This air purifier’s ionizer helps to eliminate unwanted odors from sources like pets and smoking. Then releases negative ions to thoroughly purify the surrounding air

QUIET AND PORTABLE FOR DESKS AND MORE - Measures 6.7 x 6.7 x 7.5 inches for travel size, with up to 40 sq-feet coverage. Has customizable fan settings that allow you to choose the quieter, sleep-friendly “low” power, or max-freshness “high” power. With indicator light to tell when it’s time to change the filter.

EASE OF USE and WORRY-FREE WARRANTY - With clear instructions on how to use, just plug it in and it works with one simple button. If you need any assistance, you can reach our team of experts via chat, email or phone. Includes 2-year warranty plus an extra 6-months when you sign up on our website

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,490 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
